abandoned.description: Initial development has started, but there has not yet been a stable, usable release; the project has been abandoned and the author(s) do not intend on continuing development.

active.description: The project has reached a stable, usable state and is being actively developed.

concept.description: Minimal or no implementation has been done yet.

inactive.description: The project has reached a stable, usable state but is no longer being actively developed; support/maintenance will be provided as time allows.

suspended.description: Initial development has started, but there has not yet been a stable, usable release; work has been stopped for the time being but the author(s) intend on resuming work.

unsupported.description: The project has reached a stable, usable state but the author(s) have ceased all work on it. A new maintainer may be desired.

wip.description: Initial development is in progress, but there has not yet been a stable, usable release suitable for the public.
